content:
I talked to a few folks recently about having more resources on low-level implementation details of the component model (think a less formal and more hands-on version of the component model repo's mvp documents).

To that end I created an mdbook and started writing a guide on the component model text format. I would love any feedback/help folks are willing to give.

  • repo
  • rendered book
